title: Sippi Irukkuthu Muthum Irukkuthu Lyrics Varumayin Niram Sivappu

thanthana thathana ..
sippi irukuthu
muthum irukuthu
thiranthu paarka
neram illadi rajathi

sindhai irukuthu
sandham irukuthu
kavithai paada
neram illadi rajathi(2)

sandhangal
na na naa..
neeyanaal
ri sa ri
sangeetham
mmhm hmm
naanaven

na na naa na na
come on say it once again
na na naa na na
mm.. sirikum sorgam
thara nana tharara na na
thanga thattu ennaku mattum
 ...ok?
thaare thaane thana
appadiya..
thevai paavai paarvai

thathana thana
ninaika vaithu
na na na na la la laa la la
nenjil nindru neringi vandhu
nananana na na naa..
thananaa..la la laa..thananaa

ippo paakalam...
thanana thanana na na
Mm? malaiyum veyilum enna?
thananana thanana nanna na na
unnai kandal malarum mullum enna?
thanana naa na
thanana naa na thana
ammadiyo!
thananana thanana naa
na thana ah!
Rathiyum naadum
azhagil aadum kangal
Sabash!
kavithai ulagam kenjum..
unnai kandal kaviniyan
idhayam konjum

sippi irukuthu
muthum irukuthu
thiranthu paarka neram
vanthathu ippothu
